name: Fontemer Pearl
description:
When the character to which this is attached takes DMG: Negate 1 DMG. Once per Round, Usage(s) will not be used when negating DMG from Summons.
Usage(s): 2

When you declare the end of your Round: If the character to which this is attached is the active character, draw 1 card.
descriptionraw:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached takes DMG:</color> Negate 1 DMG. Once per Round, $[K3] will not be used when negating DMG from Summons.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

<color=#FFFFFFFF>When you declare the end of your Round:</color> If the character to which this is attached is the active character, draw 1 card.
